homepage_title: Fastwork.co - The #1 Platform for Quality Freelancers Chosen by Businesses Across Thailand
homepage_app_prompt: Open via the app for the full experience
homepage_freelancer_section_title: We have a diverse range of high-quality freelancers and specialists ready to serve you
freelancer_category_1: Verified identity and portfolio in the system
specialist_category_1: Confident in skills and services verified through testing
specialist_category_3: Selected and tested for job-specific knowledge and skills by Fastwork
specialist_category_4: Completed special training on skills and service delivery from Fastwork
specialist_category_5: Holds necessary professional certifications for their field
professional_category_1: Experts in complex and large-scale projects
professional_category_3: Selected and tested for job-specific knowledge and skills by Fastwork
professional_category_4: Completed special training on skills and service delivery from Fastwork
professional_category_5: Holds necessary professional certifications for their field
professional_category_6: Screened for advanced expertise with special criteria
professional_category_7: Capable of handling highly complex and large-scale projects
how_to_use_step_1_description: Search using the search bar or select from over 70 job categories.
how_to_use_step_2_description: Click “Chat Now” to discuss job details and receive a quote from the freelancer.
how_to_use_step_3_description: Pay securely through multiple channels, with confidence in every hire as we safeguard your payment.
how_to_use_step_4_description: Rate the freelancer to provide feedback and support their improvement.
terms_and_conditions_title: Terms and Conditions for Using the Fastwork.co Platform for Freelancers
definition_1: Platform refers to the website (https://fastwork.co) and the Fastwork app.
definition_2: The platform acts as an intermediary for users to create and share services.
definition_3: Users can buy and sell services through the platform.
definition_4: Payments are made based on the value of services.
definition_5: Work refers to products or services provided by clients and freelancers.
definition_6: Company refers to the entity operating Fastwork.co.
definition_7: Fastwork provides the platform for third-party services.
definition_8: The company facilitates interactions between clients and freelancers.
definition_9: User refers to individuals using the platform’s services.
definition_10: Client refers to users hiring products or services.
definition_11: Freelancer refers to users delivering products or services.
definition_12: Service Profile (My Services) is the page for freelancer service details.
definition_13: Clients review service profiles before paying for projects.
definition_14: Job Proposal is the page for freelancers to apply for client jobs.
definition_15: Freelancers describe skills and include portfolios in job proposals.
definition_16: Job Board is the page for clients to post job requests.
definition_17: Chat/Conversation Frame is the platform’s communication channel.
definition_18: Communication includes text, voice, images, or other media.
definition_19: Project is created when a client clicks “Chat with Freelancer.”
definition_20: Users discuss job details after project creation.
definition_21: Freelancers send quotes for clients to review.
definition_22: Inactive Project has no status changes or interactions.
definition_23: Quote is a proposal sent by a freelancer to a client.
definition_24: Quotes include project scope, timeline, and costs.
definition_25: Project Fee is the amount a client agrees to pay.
definition_26: The company holds the project fee until completion.
definition_27: The project fee excludes personal income tax.
definition_28: Freelancer Platform Usage Fee is charged to freelancers.
definition_29: Client Platform Usage Fee is charged to clients.
definition_30: Fastwork Coins are points earned by clients after payments.
definition_31: Bonus Coins are points gifted by the company.
definition_32: Personal Data identifies an individual directly or indirectly.
general_terms_1: These terms are effective from August 21, 2024.
general_terms_2: The company will update the platform for changes.
general_terms_3: Users must agree to new Terms of Use.
general_terms_4: The Terms of Use are an agreement between users and the platform.
general_terms_5: The agreement defines rights and responsibilities.
general_terms_6: Users comply with the privacy policy.
general_terms_7: Users must not engage in illegal activities.
general_terms_8: The company may restrict service use for violations.
general_terms_9: Users are responsible for compliance with laws.
freelancer_commitment_1: Freelancers must understand the Terms and Conditions.
freelancer_commitment_3: Freelancers check messages and projects promptly.
freelancer_commitment_4: Failure to respond may cancel projects automatically.
freelancer_commitment_5: Cancellations affect service visibility and ranking.
freelancer_commitment_6: Conversations with clients stay on the platform.
freelancer_commitment_7: Off-platform disputes may not be assisted.
freelancer_commitment_8: Freelancers must not create false information.
freelancer_commitment_9: Freelancers must not engage in fraudulent behavior.
freelancer_commitment_10: Job details are communicated via the Chat Frame.
freelancer_commitment_11: Personal contact information must not be shared externally.
freelancer_commitment_12: Report off-platform contact within three days.
freelancer_commitment_13: Freelancers assess capabilities before listing services.
freelancer_commitment_15: Freelancers must not use others’ products as their own.
freelancer_commitment_16: Violations may lead to account suspension.
freelancer_commitment_17: Freelancers ensure timely delivery of services.
registration_2: Platform use confirms acceptance of Terms of Use.
registration_3: Users follow the company’s registration procedures.
registration_5: Users verify identity per company procedures.
registration_6: Services are listed on the 'My Services' page.
registration_8: Non-compliant profiles may not be approved.
registration_10: Inaccurate information may lead to suspension.
project_1: Clients post jobs, and freelancers submit proposals.
project_2: Clients create projects to contact freelancers.
project_4: Job details are discussed after project creation.
project_6: Freelancers notify clients of refusal reasons.
project_7: Quotes must be legal and rights-respecting.
project_9: Work starts upon project fee payment.
project_10: Users communicate via the chat feature.
project_14: Clients may complain about late deliveries.
project_15: Inactive projects are canceled after 180 days.
project_16: Canceled project fees are treated as platform fees.
communication_1: Users communicate via the chat feature.
communication_2: Communications must be legal and appropriate.
communication_3: Freelancers use chat for additional information.
communication_4: Off-platform solicitation violates Terms of Use.
communication_5: Chat data is confidential unless legally required.
section_7_title: Project Fees and Platform Usage Fees
fees_2: Project payments are made through the platform.
fees_3: The company holds project fees until delivery.
fees_5: Clients pay a platform usage fee.
fees_7: Freelancers provide bank details for transfers.
fees_8: Unprovided bank details incur a $1 monthly fee.
fees_9: Fees are transferred per bank schedules.
fees_10: Withdrawals are limited by account balance.
coins_1: Clients top up Fastwork Coins for fees.
coins_2: Coins must be used within 2 years.
coins_3: Unused Coins incur a $1 monthly fee.
coins_4: Coin refunds incur a $1 transaction fee.
coins_5: Bonus Coins are gifted for compliant use.
coins_6: Bonus Coins must be used within 1 year.
product_service_1: Freelancers deliver complete products per agreements.
product_service_2: Products are delivered via the 'Upload Product' button.
product_service_5: Canceled projects revert ownership to freelancers.
review_1: Reviews are vital for platform growth.
review_2: Only clients receiving products can review.
review_4: Review details appear on the 'My Profile' page.
review_5: Ratings are based on client reviews.
review_6: Reviews are final unless violating Terms of Use.
review_7: Freelancers must not negotiate for positive reviews.
project_status_1: Freelancers may change or cancel project status.
project_status_2: The company decides on cancellation requests.
project_status_4: Clients provide bank details for refunds.
cancellation_restrictions_1: Certain cases restrict cancellations and refunds.
account_suspension_1: The company may verify account ownership.
account_suspension_2: Users provide proof like ID or bank details.
account_suspension_3: Violations lead to warnings or suspensions.
account_suspension_4: Inappropriate behavior violates Terms of Use.
account_suspension_6: Illegal activities violate Terms of Use.
account_suspension_8: Intellectual property violations lead to suspension.
account_suspension_10: Multiple accounts violate Terms of Use.
account_suspension_11: Buying or selling accounts is prohibited.
account_suspension_12: Avoiding fees violates Terms of Use.
account_suspension_14: Suspended accounts cannot engage in transactions.
account_suspension_15: Suspended users contact the company for status.
dispute_resolution_1: Users resolve disputes via platform chat.
dispute_resolution_2: Disputes include product quality and work scope.
dispute_resolution_3: Users contact the company for mediation.
dispute_resolution_4: Users provide evidence for dispute resolution.
dispute_resolution_5: The company accesses chats for disputes.
dispute_resolution_7: Violations lead to penalties like warnings.
indemnification_1: Users compensate third parties for damages.
indemnification_2: Users using or disclosing personal data agree to compensate third-party data owners.
indemnification_3: Users compensate for intellectual property misuse.
indemnification_4: Users compensate for confidential information leaks.
indemnification_6: Users compensate the company for legal costs.
indemnification_7: Users liable to the company compensate damages.
indemnification_8: Users compensate each other per dispute terms.
indemnification_9: The company compensates users for actual damages.
company_liability_1: Platform services do not create joint liability.
company_liability_2: The company is not liable for off-scope work.
company_liability_3: The company is not liable for non-platform payments.
company_liability_4: The company is not liable for violating projects.
company_liability_5: The company is not liable for service content.
company_liability_6: The company is not liable for work quality.
company_liability_8: Affiliates are not liable for platform damages.
intellectual_property_1: Clients own product copyrights unless specified.
intellectual_property_2: Users must not violate intellectual property rights.
privacy_policy_1: Read our privacy policy at https://fastwork.co/seller-privacy.
privacy_policy_2: Personal data is treated as confidential.
privacy_policy_3: The company may access chats for monitoring.
privacy_policy_4: Users agree to content use for marketing.
contact_1: Contact the company during business hours.
note_1: These terms are subject to change without prior notice.
note_2: Users are responsible for reviewing updates to the Terms of Use.
note_3: The company reserves the right to modify platform features.
note_4: Contact support for clarification of these terms.
note_5: Users must comply with all applicable local laws.
note_6: The platform is not responsible for external service disruptions.
note_7: Users acknowledge the risks of online transactions.
note_8: The company may update payment methods periodically.
note_9: Users must report platform issues promptly.
note_10: The platform promotes fair and transparent hiring practices.
note_11: Users agree to receive platform notifications.
note_12: The company is not liable for user-generated content.
terms_acceptance: I have read and accept the Terms and Conditions of use of Fastwork
privacy_acceptance: I have read and accept the Privacy Policy
marketing_opt_in: I am interested in receiving information, offers, and promotions from Fastwork
